column5: Hello again OFC! Well I finally got a little time off work and am fishing a little derby this weekend with a a friend of mine. Anyway I'll put up another quick little report Sunday.  Anyway I wanted to share a picture of my rod collection. I remember a bunch of us sharing pictures of tackle and gear in another thread but can't seem to find it.  I picked up a couple G.Loomis rods and love them all! Well from front to back here is what I have now. Only one rod left, a TWFR855 I think it is, a Frog rod that's 7'1H I believe.  NRX854  7'1H F with a  Core50MG7 BCFR893 7'5MH F with a Curado200E7 SBR813 6'9MH XF with a Curado200E7 CBR783 6'6M Mod.F with a Curado50E   Also still have my little 6'9ML Avid with the Stradic.  Anyway put some pic's up of some new gear if anybody has it!  Have a good weekend and fall guys and girls.  MTBF
Very nice Mike.  Will they be in the classified next spring? Just asking. LOL  Very nice set ups again.
How's your truck coming?....or did you spend all your dough on fishing gear?  j/k.  sweet stuff....you're living my dream.
Nice rods, how do you like the nrx? If you dont mind me asking, where did you purchase it? I normally get all my stuff online but for a rod that expensive i want to see it in person first. Thanks
Oh please not another show me your gear thread!
